titles.title: Student Loan Lower Interest Rate and Lower Monthly Payment Refinancing Act of 2017
Student Loan Lower Interest Rate and Lower Monthly Payment Refinancing Act of 2017
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for the refinancing of certain Federal student loans.
Student Loan Lower Interest Rate and Lower Monthly Payment Refinancing Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
